articles.title: Epic Games’ Fortnite back up on Apple app store in US after nearly 5 years
articles.description: The move marksa major win for the video game company. Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: AI PCs Still Year or Two From Fulfilling Promise, Asus CEO Says
articles.description: The new crop of artificial intelligence-powered PCs will take until 2026 or later to drive the market forward, according to Asustek Computer Inc. co-Chief Executive Officer Samson Hu.

articles.title: 'Fortnite' Returns to IOS App Store in U.S.
articles.description: 'Fortnite' has officially returned to the IOS App Store in the U.S.

articles.title: Scientific breakthrough brings CO2 'breathing' batteries closer to reality
articles.description: Scientists have made a breakthrough in eco-friendly batteries that not only store more energy but could also help tackle greenhouse gas emissions. Lithium-CO2 'breathing' batteries release power while capturing carbon dioxide, offering a greener alternative that may one day outperform today's lithium-ion batteries.

articles.title: Epic Games' Fortnite back up on Apple app store in US after nearly 5 years
articles.description: Epic Games' wildly popular multiplayer shooter game "Fortnite" was available again on Apple's app store in the U.S. on Tuesday, capping a ban of nearly five years and marking a major win for the video company. The video game title was also available on the Epic Games Store and AltStore in the European Union,

articles.title: Fortnite is back on US iPhones again
articles.description: Epic Games’ Fortnite is available once again on the US iOS App Store following a ruling in Epic Games v. Apple.

articles.title: Rapid Method for Cell Density Measurement Could Help Predict Tumor Response to Treatment
articles.description: Method reveals unexpected behavior in molecular crowding during cell state transitions and suggests density as a biomarker for functional precision medicine.

articles.title: Report: Apple to Let Third-Party Developers Use Its AI Models
articles.description: Apple plans to introduce tools that will let third-party developers write software using the AI models that power Apple Intelligence.

articles.title: Project Astra Is the Secret Sauce for Google's Gemini Live AI Advances
articles.description: Think of Project Astra as the testing ground for the visual AI that comes to your phone.

articles.title: Google commits $150M to develop AI glasses with Warby Parker
articles.description: Google is committing up to $150 million in Warby Parker to develop smart glasses powered by Gemini, and is investing in the eyewear company.
